STATIC_ABOUT_WHOWEARE_P1: Oddly is mainly a reader for books, comics, newspapers and magazines designed to make your life easier and give you back a taste for digital reading.
STATIC_ABOUT_WHOWEARE_P2: Oddly allows you to read whatever you want, whenever you want, wherever you want and above all, as many times as you want. Enough multiple book purchases, newspaper ending in the trash, start thinking about our planet, and out wallets.
STATIC_ABOUT_WHOWEARE_P3: And if you really don't know what to read, thanks to its suggestion system, Oddly gives you new items every day, related to things you have already read.
STATIC_ABOUT_WHOWEARE_P4: An entire universe is just steps away from you. subscribe and enjoy, as simply as that.
